Title: The menu title [Professional Traders] cannot be clicked
Steps: 1. Navigate to capital.com 2. Select one of the licenses FCA, CYSEC, ASIC 3. Select EN language 4. Click on the menu section [Ways to trade] 5. Click on the menu title [Professional Traders]
Expected_Result: The menu title [Professional Traders] click is available
Actual_Result: The menu title [Professional Traders] cannot be clicked
